heroSection.title:
Speak English With
Confidence and Clarity
heroSection.titleMobile: We create a beautiful design with passion for startups & leading brands.
heroSection.unlock:
Unlock new opportunities
with personalized English
coaching tailored for you
heroSection.aboutUsDescription: English Master offers an intensive program that combines classroom theory with immersive practice. Through the English Area Dormitory and practice trips to Bali, we transform your knowledge into fluency and confidence for the world stage.

magicBento.title:
SPEAK ENGLISH CONFIDENTLY.
UNLOCK GLOBAL
OPPORTUNITIES.
magicBento.titleMobile: SPEAK ENGLISH CONFIDENTLY. UNLOCK GLOBAL OPPORTUNITIES.
magicBento.description: Discover programs specifically designed to help you achieve your academic and professional goals in English.

ielts.title: IELTS Score
ielts.description: Strategies & practice for the IELTS test.
ielts.label: Target Band 7+

publicSpeaking.title: Public Speaking
publicSpeaking.description: Speak in public with more confidence.
publicSpeaking.label: Confident

grammar.title: Master Grammar
grammar.description: Deepen your understanding of English grammar.
grammar.label: Strong Foundation

benefits.title: Course Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Discover why thousands of students choose us for the English Master Program.

dormitory.title: Dormitory Area
dormitory.description: Accelerate fluency and build confidence by living in a 24/7 immersive environment.

expertTutors.title: Expert Tutors
expertTutors.description: Master comprehensive material from grammar to speaking with experienced instructors.

realPractice.title: Real Practice
realPractice.description: Apply your skills directly in real-world situations during a free trip to Bali.

officialCertification.title: Official Certification
officialCertification.description: Enhance your CV with a Ministry of Education certificate and official TOEFL ITP score for a global career.

tutors.title: Meet Our Tutors
tutors.subtitle: Our tutors are experienced educators who are passionate about teaching and helping students achieve their language learning goals.

pricing.title: Unlock Your Global Potential
pricing.subtitle: Our programs are designed to take you from beginner to proficient, opening doors to limitless opportunities.

journey.title: Start Your Fluency Journey
journey.subtitle: Choose the payment method that suits you best and start your transformation today.
journey.switch: You can switch between full payment or monthly installments.

englishMaster.title: English Master
englishMaster.description: An intensive program to master grammar, speaking, pronunciation, and vocabulary, plus practice in Bali.
englishMaster.bonus: FREE: Jacket + Batik + T-shirt + E-Certificate with Ministry of Education Decree

englishMasterPlus.title: English Master Plus
englishMasterPlus.description: Everything from English Master, plus intensive preparation and an official TOEFL ITP test for a global career.
englishMasterPlus.bonus: FREE: Jacket + Batik + T-shirt + E-Certificate with Ministry of Education Decree

testimonials.title:
What Our Alumni Are
Saying
testimonials.subtitle: Our English programs have transformed careers and opened up a world of opportunities for our alumni.

aria.name: Aria Chen
aria.title: Software Engineer
aria.quote: This course gave me the confidence to ace my interviews in English. I landed my dream job at a multinational company!

ben.name: Ben Carter
ben.title: University Student
ben.quote: Thanks to the IELTS prep course, I exceeded my target score and got accepted into my first-choice university abroad.

carla.name: Carla Rodriguez
carla.title: Travel Blogger
carla.quote: My conversational skills improved dramatically. I can now travel the world and connect with people from different cultures.

david.name: David Lee
david.title: Graphic Designer
david.quote: The learning environment is so supportive and fun. The tutors make grammar easy to understand and practice.

eva.name: Eva Williams
eva.title: Marketing Manager
eva.quote: I can finally lead international meetings with confidence. This program was a game-changer for my career.
